extracted_rules.Rule: Determine perimeter segments abutting house walls

Conditions.Mandatory: Segments abutting house walls are considered closed

Relationships.Hierarchical: Segments A, B, C are closed segments

Dimensional.Height: Measured from top of porch floor to intersection with top of roof material

Conditions.Conditional logic: If at least 50% of the facade area is open, then the segment is considered open

Exceptions.Allowances: Allowances may be made for structural supports that are not excessive

Relationships.Logical dependencies: Open/closed status depends on facade openness

Qualifiers.Scope: Facade segments D, E, F, G

Relationships.Cross-references: Status of segments based on width and additional conditions
